vernac_cmds: From mathcomp Require Import ssreflect ssrbool ssrfun ssrnat eqtype seq.
From LemmaOverloading Require Import prelude heaps rels hprop domains.
Inductive exn : Type := exn_from_nat : nat -> exn.
Definition exn_to_nat (e : exn) : nat := let: exn_from_nat y := e in y.
Definition eqexn (e1 e2 : exn) : bool := match e1, e2 with exn_from_nat m, exn_from_nat n => m == n end.
Canonical Structure exn_eqType := EqType exn exn_eqMixin.
Inductive ans (A : Type) : Type := Val of A | Exn of exn.
Notation post A := (ans A -> heap -> heap -> Prop).
Definition spec B := pre * post B : Type.
Definition defed (P : Pred heap) : Pred heap := fun i => i \In P /\ def i.
Lemma singleP i : i \In defed P -> this i <== defed P.
Definition single i (pf : i \In defed P) := Ideal (singleP pf).
Lemma bound (p : ideald P) i : i \In id_val p -> i \In defed P.
Definition prog := ideald P -> ans A -> Pred heap.
Definition coherent (e : prog) := forall p x m, m \In e p x <-> exists i, exists pf : i \In id_val p, m \In e (single (bound pf)) x.
Definition def_strict (e : prog) := forall p x, Undef \Notin e p x.
Definition runs_of (e : prog) : Pred (heap * ans A * heap) := fun r => exists pf : r.1.1 \In defed P, r.2 \In e (single pf) r.1.2.
Definition has_spec A (s : spec A) := [Pred c : prog A s.1 | forall i y m, (i, y, m) \In runs_of c -> s.2 y i m].
Structure ST := STprog { model : prog A s.1; _ : coherent model; _ : def_strict model; _ : model \In has_spec s}.
Lemma modelE (e1 e2 : ST) : e1 = e2 <-> model e1 = model e2.
move: e1 e2=>[e1 M1 S1 H1][e2 M2 S2 H2] /=; split=>[[//]|E].
rewrite E in M1 S1 H1 *.
Definition st_leq e1 e2 := model e1 <== model e2.
Lemma st_refl e : st_leq e e.
Lemma st_asym e1 e2 : st_leq e1 e2 -> st_leq e2 e1 -> e1 = e2.
move: e1 e2=>[e1 M1 S1 H1][e2 M2 S2 H2]; rewrite /st_leq /= => E1 E2.
rewrite (poset_asym E1 E2) in M1 M2 S1 S2 H1 H2 *; congr STprog; by apply: proof_irrelevance.
Lemma st_trans e1 e2 e3 : st_leq e1 e2 -> st_leq e2 e3 -> st_leq e1 e3.
move: e1 e2 e3=>[e1 M1 S1 H1][e2 M2 S2 H2][e3 M3 S3 H3].
Definition st_bot' := bot : [poset of prog A s.1].
by move=>r x m; split=>//; case=>i [].
Definition st_bot := STprog st_bot_coherent st_bot_dstrict st_bot_has_spec.
Lemma st_botP e : st_leq st_bot e.
Definition stPosetMixin := PosetMixin st_botP st_refl st_asym st_trans.
Canonical stPoset := Eval hnf in Poset ST stPosetMixin.
Definition st_sup' (u : Pred ST) := sup [Pred p | exists e, p = model e /\ e \In u].
exists i; exists pf; exists (p (single (bound pf)) x m).
have: exists i, exists pf : i \In id_val r, m \In p (single (bound pf)) x.
move/M=>H3; exists (p r x m); split=>//; do 3![eexists _; split=>//].
Lemma st_sup_has_spec u : st_sup' u \In has_spec s.
Definition st_sup u := STprog (@st_sup_coherent u) (@st_sup_dstrict u) (@st_sup_has_spec u).
Lemma st_supP (u : Pred ST) e : e \In u -> st_leq e (st_sup u).
by case: e=>p M S H R; apply: supP; exists (STprog M S H).
Lemma st_supM (u : Pred ST) e : (forall e1, e1 \In u -> st_leq e1 e) -> st_leq (st_sup u) e.
by case: e=>p M S H R; apply: supM=>y [q][->]; apply: R.
Lemma model_runs p y m (e : ST) : m \In model e p y <-> exists i, i \In id_val p /\ (i, y, m) \In runs_of (model e).
case: e=>mod M S H; rewrite M; split; case=>i [H1] H2.
by exists i; split=>//; exists (bound H1).
exists i; exists H1; case: H2 =>/= H2.
Lemma def_runs i y m (e : ST) : (i, y, m) \In runs_of (model e) -> [/\ def i, i \In s.1 & def m].
by case: e R=>p M S H; case: m=>//; move/S.
Lemma spec_runs i y m (e : ST) : (i, y, m) \In runs_of (model e) -> s.2 y i m.
by case: e=>p M S; apply.
Arguments spec_runs {A s i y m}.
Variables (A : Type) (B : A -> Type) (s : forall x, spec (B x)).
Notation lat := (dfunLattice (fun x => [lattice of ST (s x)])).
Definition f' (e : lat) := sup [Pred t : lat | exists e', e' <== e /\ t = f e'].
Definition ret_s : spec A := (fun i => True, fun y i m => m = i /\ y = Val x).
Definition ret_sp (p : ideald ret_s.1) y m := m \In id_val p /\ y = Val x.
move=>p y m; split; first by case=>H ->{y}; exists m; exists H.
by move=>i y m; case=>/= T [-> ->].
Definition ret := STprog ret_coherent ret_dstrict ret_has_spec.
Definition throw_s : spec A := (fun i => True, fun y i m => m = i /\ y = Exn e).
Definition throw_sp (p : ideald throw_s.1) y m := m \In id_val p /\ y = @Exn A e.
move=>p y m; split; first by case=>H ->{y}; exists m; exists H.
by move=>i y m; case=>/= T [-> ->].
Definition throw := STprog throw_coherent throw_dstrict throw_has_spec.
Variables (s1 : spec A) (s2 : A -> spec B).
Variables (e1 : ST s1) (e2 : forall x, ST (s2 x)).
Definition bind_pre : pre := fun i => s1.1 i /\ forall x m, s1.2 (Val x) i m -> (s2 x).1 m.
Definition bind_post : post B := fun y i m => (exists x, exists h, s1.2 (Val x) i h /\ (s2 x).2 y h m) \/ (exists e, y = Exn e /\ s1.2 (Exn e) i m).

Definition bind_sp (p : ideald bind_s.1) y m := exists i, exists x, exists h, i \In id_val p /\ (i, x, h) \In runs_of (model e1) /\ match x with Val x' => (h, y, m) \In runs_of (model (e2 x')) | Exn e => y = Exn e /\ m = h end.
by exists i; exists H1; exists i; exists x; exists h.
by exists i; exists x; exists h.
case: x=>[x'|e] H2; first by case/def_runs.
by case=>_ E; case/def_runs: H2; rewrite -E.
move=>T2; left; exists x; exists j.
by split; [apply: spec_runs T1 | apply: spec_runs T2].
Definition bind := STprog bind_coherent bind_dstrict bind_has_spec.
Variables (A B : Type) (s : spec A) (s1 : A -> spec B) (s2 : exn -> spec B).
Variables (e : ST s) (e1 : forall x, ST (s1 x)) (e2 : forall x, ST (s2 x)).
Definition try_pre : pre := fun i => s.1 i /\ (forall y m, s.2 (Val y) i m -> (s1 y).1 m) /\ forall e m, s.2 (Exn e) i m -> (s2 e).1 m.
Definition try_post : post B := fun y i m => (exists x, exists h, s.2 (Val x) i h /\ (s1 x).2 y h m) \/ (exists e, exists h, s.2 (Exn e) i h /\ (s2 e).2 y h m).

Definition try_sp (p : ideald try_s.1) y m := exists i, exists x, exists h, i \In id_val p /\ (i, x, h) \In runs_of (model e) /\ match x with Val x' => (h, y, m) \In runs_of (model (e1 x')) | Exn e => (h, y, m) \In runs_of (model (e2 e)) end.
by exists i; exists H1; exists i; exists x; exists h.
by exists i; exists x; exists h.
case: x=>[x'|e'] T1 T2; [left; exists x' | right; exists e']; exists j; by split; [apply: spec_runs T1 | apply: spec_runs T2].
Definition try := STprog try_coherent try_dstrict try_has_spec.
Definition conseq A (s1 s2 : spec A) := forall i, s2.1 i -> def i -> s1.1 i /\ forall y m, s1.2 y i m -> def m -> s2.2 y i m.
Lemma conseq_refl (A : Type) (s : spec A) : conseq s s.
Variables (A : Type) (s1 s2 : spec A) (e : ST s1) (pf : conseq s1 s2).
Definition do_sp (p : ideald s2.1) y m := exists i, i \In id_val p /\ (i, y, m) \In runs_of (model e).
by case=>i [/= H1 T1]; exists i; exists H1; exists i.
by case=>i [/= H1][_][<-] T1; exists i.
move=>i y m [[/= S1 D1]][_][<-] T; case/def_runs: (T)=>_ S2 D2.
by apply: (proj2 (pf S1 D1)) D2; apply: spec_runs T.
Definition Do := STprog do_coherent do_dstrict do_has_spec.
Definition read_s : spec A := (fun i => x \in dom i /\ exists v:A, look x i = dyn v, fun y i m => m = i /\ forall v, look x i = dyn v -> y = Val v).
Definition read_sp (p : ideald read_s.1) (v : ans A) m := m \In id_val p /\ exists w, v = Val w /\ look x m = dyn w.
move=>p v m; split; last first.
by exists m; exists H1; split=>//; exists w.
by split=>// b1; rewrite H3=>H; move:(dyn_inj H)=>->.
Definition read := STprog read_coherent read_dstrict read_has_spec.
Definition write_s : spec unit := (fun i => x \in dom i : Prop, fun y i m => y = Val tt /\ upd i x (dyn v) = m).
Definition write_sp (p : ideald write_s.1) (y : ans unit) m := exists i, i \In id_val p /\ x \in dom i /\ y = Val tt /\ m = upd i x (dyn v).
by case=>H2 [->->]; exists i; exists H1; exists i.
suff L: def (upd i x (dyn v)) by move=>H4; rewrite -H4 in L.
Definition write := STprog write_coherent write_dstrict write_has_spec.
Definition alloc_s : spec ptr := (fun i => def i : Prop, fun y i m => exists x, x != null /\ y = Val x /\ x \notin dom i /\ upd i x (dyn v) = m).
Definition alloc_sp (p : ideald alloc_s.1) y m := exists i, i \In id_val p /\ exists l : ptr, y = Val l /\ m = i :+ l :-> v /\ l != null /\ l \notin dom i.
by exists i; exists H1; exists i; split=>//; exists l.
by exists i; split=>//; exists l.
case=>p H y [m][/= H1][l][H2][H3][H4] H5; case/H: H1=>_ D.
suff {H3}: def (m :+ l :-> v) by rewrite -H3.
by rewrite unC defPtUn H4 D H5.
rewrite (_ : i = i :+ empty); last by rewrite unh0.
Definition alloc := STprog alloc_coherent alloc_dstrict alloc_has_spec.
Definition allocb_s : spec ptr := (fun i => def i : Prop, fun y i m => exists r, y = Val r /\ m = i :+ updi r (nseq n v)).
Definition allocb_sp (p : ideald allocb_s.1) y m := exists i, i \In id_val p /\ y = Val (fresh i) /\ m = i :+ updi (fresh i) (nseq n v).
by case=>i [H1][->] ->; exists i; exists H1; exists i.
case=>p H y [m][/= H1][_] H2; case/H: H1=>_ D.
suff {H2}: def (m :+ updi (fresh m) (nseq n v)) by rewrite -H2.
elim: n =>[|k IH]; first by rewrite /= unh0.
rewrite (_ : nseq k.+1 v = rcons (nseq k v) v); last first.
rewrite updi_last unA unC defPtUn IH /=.
by rewrite dom_fresh updimV negb_and fresh_null ltnn.
by move=>i y m [[/= H D]][_][<-][->] ->; exists (fresh i).
Definition allocb := STprog allocb_coherent allocb_dstrict allocb_has_spec.
Definition dealloc_s : spec unit := (fun i => x \in dom i : Prop, fun y i m => y = Val tt /\ free x i = m).
Definition dealloc_sp (p : ideald dealloc_s.1) (y : ans unit) m := exists i, i \In id_val p /\ y = Val tt /\ x \in dom i /\ m = free x i.
by case=>i [H1][->][H2] ->; exists i; exists H1; exists i.
case=>p H y [h][/=]; case/H=>_ H1 [H2][H3] H4.
suff: def (free x h) by rewrite -H4.
Definition dealloc := STprog dealloc_coherent dealloc_dstrict dealloc_has_spec.

command: move: e1 e2=>[e1 M1 S1 H1][e2 M2 S2 H2] /=; split=>[[//]|E].
rewrite E in M1 S1 H1 *.
move: e1 e2=>[e1 M1 S1 H1][e2 M2 S2 H2]; rewrite /st_leq /= => E1 E2.
rewrite (poset_asym E1 E2) in M1 M2 S1 S2 H1 H2 *; congr STprog; by apply: proof_irrelevance.
move: e1 e2 e3=>[e1 M1 S1 H1][e2 M2 S2 H2][e3 M3 S3 H3].
by move=>r x m; split=>//; case=>i [].
exists i; exists pf; exists (p (single (bound pf)) x m).
have: exists i, exists pf : i \In id_val r, m \In p (single (bound pf)) x.
move/M=>H3; exists (p r x m); split=>//; do 3![eexists _; split=>//].
by case: e=>p M S H R; apply: supP; exists (STprog M S H).
by case: e=>p M S H R; apply: supM=>y [q][->]; apply: R.
case: e=>mod M S H; rewrite M; split; case=>i [H1] H2.
by exists i; split=>//; exists (bound H1).
exists i; exists H1; case: H2 =>/= H2.
by case: e R=>p M S H; case: m=>//; move/S.
by case: e=>p M S; apply.
move=>p y m; split; first by case=>H ->{y}; exists m; exists H.
by move=>i y m; case=>/= T [-> ->].
move=>p y m; split; first by case=>H ->{y}; exists m; exists H.
by move=>i y m; case=>/= T [-> ->].
by exists i; exists H1; exists i; exists x; exists h.
by exists i; exists x; exists h.
case: x=>[x'|e] H2; first by case/def_runs.
by case=>_ E; case/def_runs: H2; rewrite -E.
move=>T2; left; exists x; exists j.
by split; [apply: spec_runs T1 | apply: spec_runs T2].
by exists i; exists H1; exists i; exists x; exists h.
by exists i; exists x; exists h.
case: x=>[x'|e'] T1 T2; [left; exists x' | right; exists e']; exists j; by split; [apply: spec_runs T1 | apply: spec_runs T2].
by case=>i [/= H1 T1]; exists i; exists H1; exists i.
by case=>i [/= H1][_][<-] T1; exists i.
move=>i y m [[/= S1 D1]][_][<-] T; case/def_runs: (T)=>_ S2 D2.
by apply: (proj2 (pf S1 D1)) D2; apply: spec_runs T.
move=>p v m; split; last first.
by exists m; exists H1; split=>//; exists w.
by split=>// b1; rewrite H3=>H; move:(dyn_inj H)=>->.
by case=>H2 [->->]; exists i; exists H1; exists i.
suff L: def (upd i x (dyn v)) by move=>H4; rewrite -H4 in L.
by exists i; exists H1; exists i; split=>//; exists l.
by exists i; split=>//; exists l.
case=>p H y [m][/= H1][l][H2][H3][H4] H5; case/H: H1=>_ D.
suff {H3}: def (m :+ l :-> v) by rewrite -H3.
by rewrite unC defPtUn H4 D H5.
rewrite (_ : i = i :+ empty); last by rewrite unh0.
by case=>i [H1][->] ->; exists i; exists H1; exists i.
case=>p H y [m][/= H1][_] H2; case/H: H1=>_ D.
suff {H2}: def (m :+ updi (fresh m) (nseq n v)) by rewrite -H2.
elim: n =>[|k IH]; first by rewrite /= unh0.
rewrite (_ : nseq k.+1 v = rcons (nseq k v) v); last first.
rewrite updi_last unA unC defPtUn IH /=.
by rewrite dom_fresh updimV negb_and fresh_null ltnn.
by move=>i y m [[/= H D]][_][<-][->] ->; exists (fresh i).
by case=>i [H1][->][H2] ->; exists i; exists H1; exists i.
case=>p H y [h][/=]; case/H=>_ H1 [H2][H3] H4.
suff: def (free x h) by rewrite -H4.
